BasicInfo.short: VeloCloud, a cloud networking services company, simplifies branch WAN networking. VeloCloud is headquartered in Mountain View, CA.

Products.name: VeloCloud Cloud-Delivered SD-WAN
Products.description: VeloCloud Cloud SD-WAN simplifies WAN deployments to branch offices and mobile users everywhere, leveraging the economy of Internet.

news.title: Vonage SmartWAN to Deliver Enhanced Quality of Service for Business Customers
